channel.title: Weapon quickness problem

item.title: Weapon quickness problem
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

[code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4153)) //maul
{
PkingDelay = 10;
wepdelay = 10;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4718)) //dh axe
{
PkingDelay = 8;
wepdelay = 8;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (6528)) //obby maul
{
PkingDelay = 10;
wepdelay = 10;
}

else
{
PkingDelay = 5;
wepdelay = 5;
}[/code]

When I try and make the weapons above their certain speed, only the last item (the obby maul) will actually work using them.

If I put the dx axe code at the bottom of the lot, that would be the only code that would work.

Could someone help me please? Thanks.

Read full topic
